segments.text: Welcome to today's tutorial on smart video editing.
We'll be exploring how AI can help automate the B-roll insertion process.
First, let's understand what makes a good B-roll clip.
B-roll should complement your main content and add visual interest.
Now, let's see how our system analyzes your A-roll content.
The AI identifies natural pause points and topic transitions.
This allows for seamless B-roll insertion at the perfect moments.
Let's take a look at the product demonstration.
As you can see, the interface is intuitive and user-friendly.
The timeline view shows exactly where each B-roll clip will be placed.
